sandy.parser.ColladaParser

type
class
extends
AParser
implements
IParser

Constructor

new()
parameters
p_sUrl Can be either a string pointing to the location of the COLLADA file or an instance of an embedded COLLADA file.
p_nScale The scale factor.
p_sTextureExtension Overrides texture extension. You might want to use it for models that specify BMP or PCX textures.
Creates a new COLLADA parser instance.
